measured_by: Quality Assessment Tool for Studies with Diverse Designs (QATSDD)
justification: The authors state they "complemented [the impact score] with the Quality Assessment Tool, which is specifically designed for mixed-methods reviews to assess the risk-of-bias of individual studies (QATSDD; Sirriyeh et al., 2012)."

topic_or_construct: strength of evidence that a factor impacts early childcare access
justification: Under "Impact score" the article explains that "the impact score summarizes the strength of the evidence that a given factor has an impact on access to early childcare," with coders assigning values on a ‑2 to +2 scale.
The Methods section notes that "to assess publication bias, we performed p-curve analyses on the available sample of p-values," using the shape of the p-curve to detect potential p-hacking.
